#summary Building Pectin from source

= Building and running the demo =

Pectin uses [http://gradle.org Gradle] as its build system.  You don't need to have gradle installed, it will download itself the first time you run the build script.

*Running the Demo*

From the demo directory:
{{{
./gradlew run
}}}


*Building the JAR*

From the gwt-pectin folder:
{{{
./gradlew libs
}}}

To see the list of available targets type:
{{{
./gradlew -t
}}}
